page.title: 11Education.
page.content:
In Beckington there is a play-group and a school. The play-group ages are 3-4 yrs. and the school ages are 4-9 yrs. I go to Beckington school and I am 9. After the holidays I will go to Selwood Middle School and after that to Frome College. A coach takes the children to Selwood and brings them back but when you go to the college you have to go on the service bus.
{ Beckington First School }was built in 1852. School starts at 9.15 a.m. and finishes at 3.30 p.m. There are two classes. The teachers are Mrs. T.C. Smith and Mrs. V. Johnson. I am in Mrs. Smith's class and I bring her flowers. Mrs. Leach takes us on Thursdays because Mrs. Smith has to do her papers. There are 36 children in the school.
